SEARCH
Package com.TheBigAdventure.characterEntities

Class Player

java.lang.Object
com.TheBigAdventure.characterEntities.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
CanFight, Character
public final class Player extends Object implements Character, CanFight
The Player class represents a player in the game. It manages the player's attributes and behaviors, such as the skin, position, and interactions.
